name: feature-inventory
description: Reverse-engineers every feature across codebases using Agent Teams. Builds a code reference index, hunts indirect connections, constructs an outcome graph, and derives features from outcomes — not implementations. Includes graph-based and dimension-based inventory pipelines, gap analysis, plan generation, incremental reindex, and marketing catalogs

plugins.name: feature-inventory
plugins.description: Reverse-engineers every feature across codebases using Agent Teams. Builds a code reference index, hunts indirect connections, constructs an outcome graph, and derives features from outcomes — not implementations. Includes graph-based and dimension-based inventory pipelines, gap analysis, plan generation with TDD stubs, incremental reindex, and marketing catalog generation. REQUIRES Agent Teams enabled.
